text: The world lost more than a few stars in 2018. There were a slew of celebrity deaths this year that broke the world's collective heart, and we're taking a moment to remember all of the famous faces that passed away over the last 12 months. From the ` ` Queen of Soul'' Aretha Franklin's devastating passing in August, to Anthony Bourdain's heartbreaking suicide and Burt Reynolds'death, there were a handful of legends that were taken from us too soon. Kate Space, Avicii, Mac Miller and Nancy Sinatra were also among the stars who died in 2018, as were Stan Lee, Margot Kidder, Tab Hunter, Verne Troyer and Joe Jackson.
